Plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.
Title: Lethal Weapon 2
Writer: Jeffrey Boam (screenplay), Shane Black (story), Warren Murphy (story), Shane Black (characters)
Actors: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland
tomatoConsensus: Lethal Weapon 2 may sport a thin plot typical of action fare, but its combination of humor and adrenaline, along with the chemistry between its leads, make this a playful, entertaining sequel.
